Yibada (English Edition)Earth's First Snake Likely Evolved On Land, Not In WaterNPRSome scientists have speculated that snakes first evolved in water and that their long, slithery bodies were streamlined for swimming. But a new analysis suggests that the most recent common ancestor of all snakes actually lived on land.
